Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes links that can be asserted between two clinical statements - such as naming of a problem.

p.strong: Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Link Assertion MIM subset with subset original id 1091000000136.

Description.p: The use of this subset is Mandatory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."Â
